content: Stream created by Matt Cuffaro.
Hey, would you want to rename this stream to just "philosophy", "math philosophy" or "categorical philosophy", etc?
Yes, toposophy really is an ugly name!
haha it was a reference to a phrase I read in Moerdijk. Categorical Philosophy would be fine pending another suggestion
Considering that the whole zulip thing is about CT, I think Philosophy would suffice, as @Christian Williams suggests
Christian Williams renamed stream toposophy to philosophy.
